Improve this doc View source

pfInlineNotification
directive in module patternfly.notification

Description

The main visual element of the notification message.

Usage

as element:
<pf-inline-notification
       [pf-notification-type="{expression}"]
       [pf-notification-message="{expression}"]
       [pf-notification-header="{expression}"]
       [pf-notification-persistent="{expression}"]
       [pf-notification-remove="{expression}"]>
</pf-inline-notification>

Directive info

  • This directive creates new scope.

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
pfNotificationType
(optional)
expression

The type of the notification message. Allowed value is one of these: 'success','info','danger', 'warning'.

pfNotificationMessage
(optional)
expression

The main text message of the notification.

pfNotificationHeader
(optional)
expression

The header text of the notification.

pfNotificationPersistent
(optional)
expression

The notification won't disappear after delay timeout, but has to be closed manually with the close button.

pfNotificationRemove
(optional)
expression

The function to remove the notification (called by the close button when clicked).

Example
